amendment.description: Amendment to require the GSA to study CLEA's real estate needs due to changes in the Agency's structure. It then authorizes the GSA to sell the current CLEA building if CLEA's real estate needs have changed and there is no government department or agency that can utilize the building.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 115-163 to require the GSA to study CLEA's real estate needs due to changes in the Agency's structure. It then authorizes the GSA to sell the current CLEA building if CLEA's real estate needs have changed and there is no government department or agency that can utilize the building.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 185 (Roll no. 298).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 185 (Roll no. 298).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Buck.
